item.title: South Korea says about 10 North Korean troops crossed their border
item.description: South Korea fired warning shots after, Seoul says, North Korean troops crossed their border. The soldiers then went back to the North, Seoul said.

item.title: Overseas financial markets and U.S. futures rebound after wild day on Wall Street
item.description: Overseas shares and U.S. futures advanced Tuesday markets calmed somewhat after the shocks from President Trump 's tariff hikes.

item.title: Rocket carrying NASA's Jonny Kim, 2 cosmonauts docks with space station
item.description: The craft carrying astronaut Jonny Kim and two Russian cosmonauts docked with the space station. They're scheduled for an eight-month stay.

item.title: When is the next total solar eclipse in the U.S.?
item.description: The next solar eclipses where parts of he continental U.S. will experience totality won't be until 2044 and 2045.

item.title: 4/7: America Decides
item.description: President Trump says heâ€™s not looking at pausing tariffs; Senator Bernie Sanders discusses taking on the Trump administration
